root.name: Blast Lacrosse
root.description: Blast Lacrosse included all 9 teams from the NLL at that time. The teams included were: Albany Attack Buffalo BanditsColumbus LandsharksNew York SaintsOttawa Rebel Philadelphia Wings Rochester Knighthawks Toronto RockWashington Power The game play by play was voiced by Scott Ferrall, who is a sports commentator and sports radio host.
